    • Method Detail

      • getAllSubjectCodes

        public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<java.lang.String> getAllSubjectCodes(ServerManager sm)
        Static method used to get all the subject codes the client can connect to
        Parameters:
        sm - The servermanager object handling the server connection
        Returns:
        a list of all the subject codes from the database

      • serverHasLecture

        public static boolean serverHasLecture(ServerManager sm,
                                       java.lang.String classID)
        static method to request from the server to see if a lecture is being held in requested classID. This is used as a check to see wether a client can proceed to a new view.
        Parameters:
        sm - the server manager handling the connection to the database
        classID - the class code
        Returns:
        a boolean confirming if a lecture is being held with the suggested class code
